title: Episode 68 w/ DJ Premier & Pete Rock
itunes:title: Episode 68 w/ DJ Premier & Pete Rock
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with two of hip hop's iconic producers; DJ Premier and Pete Rock. They talk Biggie, Gangstarr, Guru, Kanye West, break down the making of iconic records like Mass Appeal, T.R.O.Y. and a lot more. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
